contexts.context: ...Important information about new inventions, medical articles, <mark>statistical</mark> news and similar whatever interests people.
...is has been necessary to publish a set of <mark>statistics</mark> each time.
And thus, a <mark>statistic</mark> about the baptised Jews in Vienna has been published...
...namely 313 men and 238 women. In this <mark>statistic</mark>, the job and occupation of the baptised Jews...
And this public <mark>statistic</mark> has not made a huge impression at all....
